meanings.sent1: The rule was inapplicable to our situation.
meanings.sent2: The instructions were inapplicable to the task at hand.
meanings.sent3: It was inapplicable to wear a winter coat in the summer.
meanings.sent4: Her advice was inapplicable to my current dilemma.
meanings.sent5: The outdated manual was inapplicable to the new software.

meanings.definition: Not capable of being applied or used.
meanings.sent1: The broken tool was inapplicable for the job.
meanings.sent2: His expired passport was inapplicable for travel.
meanings.sent3: Trying to use a hammer for sewing is inapplicable.
meanings.sent4: Her skills were inapplicable to the project requirements.
meanings.sent5: The wrong key was inapplicable to the lock.
